name: Axonquantifier
body:
### Welcome Axonquantifier.
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

### Paper Title
Author information, Citation, etc... links to it.

### Tutorial - Example of how to quantify axons from folders of .tiff/.jpg/.png files. 
First download R code/Sample data [here]https://github.com/Axonquantifier/Axonquantifier/tree/gh-pages)
You will need the sample data or your own images, as well as the Axonquantifier.R file
Note, you will need to modify this code to point towards your code/files

      ### To install required packages, uncomment and run this
      # source("http://www.bioconductor.org/biocLite.R")
      # biocLite("EBImage")
      library("EBImage")
      source(".../.../R/Axonquantifier.R")

      ###To obtain mean quantification for folder of images
      Axonquantifier_data<-Image.process.Individual(".../.../Treatment_Folder", ".../.../Output_Directory","Colour")

      ###To obtain image level quantification for folder of images
      Axonquantifier_data<-Image.process.Average(".../.../Treatment_Folder", ".../.../Output_Directory","Colour")


### Authors and Contributors
Aaron and Robin etc......
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
